scripts.problema1: npm start hillClimbing problema1 && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema1 && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema1
scripts.problema2: npm start hillClimbing problema2 && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema2 && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema2
scripts.problema3: npm start hillClimbing problema3 ./input/tsp-example-rwanda-1621cities.txt && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema3 ./input/tsp-example-rwanda-1621cities.txt && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema3 ./input/tsp-example-rwanda-1621cities.txt
scripts.all: npm run problema1 && npm run problema2 && npm run problema3
